ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
## Cloud Foundry expects the boolean to be lowercase trace=$traceMode trace=$(echo $trace | sed 's/.*/\L&/') export CF_TRACE=$trace
echo "###################################" echo "### Install CLI" echo "###################################"
echo "wget $cliURL" wget $cliURL
echo "rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm" rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm
echo "###################################" echo "### Login" echo "###################################"
echo "cf login -a $API -u $username -p <password> -s $space" cf login -a $API -u $username -p $password -s "$space"
echo "###################################" echo "### Remove CF App" echo "###################################"
if [ "$exposeAsService" != "FALSE" ]; then if [ -z "$upsAppName" ]; then upsAppName="$appName" fi echo "cf delete-service $upsAppName -f" cf delete-service $upsAppName -f fi
echo "cf delete $appName -f" cf delete $appName -f
echo "###################################" echo "### Logout" echo "###################################" echo "cf lo" cf lo

#!/bin/bash
## Cloud Foundry expects the boolean to be lowercase trace=$traceMode trace=$(echo $trace | sed 's/.*/\L&/') export CF_TRACE=$trace
echo "###################################" echo "### Install CLI" echo "###################################"
echo "wget $cliURL" wget $cliURL
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to download CLI, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm" rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to install CLI, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Login" echo "###################################"
echo "cf login -a $API -u $username -p <password> -s $space" cf login -a $API -u $username -p $password -s "$space"
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to login to Cloud Foundry, exiting" exit 1 fi
if [ -n "$instances" ]; then echo "###################################" echo "### Scale App" echo "###################################"
echo "cf scale $appName -i $instances" cf scale $appName -i $instances
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to scale instances, exiting" exit 1 fi fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Handle any binding changes" echo "###################################"
### Handle App->Service binding if [ -n "$bind_service0" ]; then restartRequired="TRUE" echo "cf bind-service $appName $bind_service0" cf bind-service $appName $bind_service0 fi if [ -n "$bind_service1" ]; then restartRequired="TRUE" echo "cf bind-service $appName $bind_service1" cf bind-service $appName $bind_service1 fi if [ -n "$bind_service2" ]; then restartRequired="TRUE" echo "cf bind-service $appName $bind_service2" cf bind-service $appName $bind_service2 fi if [ -n "$bind_service3" ]; then restartRequired="TRUE" echo "cf bind-service $appName $bind_service3" cf bind-service $appName $bind_service3 fi
### Handle App->Service unbinding if [ -n "$unbind_service0" ]; then restartRequired="TRUE" echo "cf unbind-service $appName $bind_service0" cf unbind-service $appName $bind_service0 fi
if [ -n "$unbind_service1" ]; then restartRequired="TRUE" echo "cf unbind-service $appName $bind_service1" cf unbind-service $appName $bind_service1 fi
if [ -n "$unbind_service2" ]; then restartRequired="TRUE" echo "cf unbind-service $appName $bind_service2" cf unbind-service $appName $bind_service2 fi
if [ -n "$unbind_service3" ]; then restartRequired="TRUE" echo "cf unbind-service $appName $bind_service3" cf unbind-service $appName $bind_service3 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Handle content update" echo "###################################"
if [[ $APPD_PREV_artifact ]]; then echo "Artifact appears to have changed!" echo "Stopping $appName" cf stop $appName echo "Pushing new artifact:" echo "cf push $appName -p $artifact" cf push $appName -p $artifact restartRequired="TRUE" fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Restart if required" echo "###################################"
if [ restartRequired = "TRUE" ]; then echo "cf restart $appName" cf restart $appName fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Logout" echo "###################################" echo "cf lo" cf lo

#!/bin/bash
## Cloud Foundry expects the boolean to be lowercase trace=$traceMode trace=$(echo $trace | sed 's/.*/\L&/') export CF_TRACE=$trace
echo "###################################" echo "### Install CLI" echo "###################################"
echo "wget $cliURL" wget $cliURL
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to download CLI, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm" rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to install CLI, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Login" echo "###################################"
echo "cf login -a $API -u $username -p <password> -s $space" cf login -a $API -u $username -p $password -s "$space"
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to login to Cloud Foundry, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Push App to CF" echo "###################################"
### Check to see format of artifact ### If it's a ZIP it needs to be extracted and pushed as a directory ### Otherwise handle it as artifact directly if [[ $artifact =~ \.zip$ ]]; then yum install -y unzip echo "Unzipping artifact..." unzip $artifact -d /tmp/cfunzipped/ cd /tmp/cfunzipped/ cfcommand="cf push $appName --no-start" cf login -a $API -u $username -p $password -s "$space" else cfcommand="cf push $appName -p $artifact --no-start" fi
### Check for a buildpack if [ -n "$buildpack" ]; then cfcommand="$cfcommand -b $buildpack" fi if [ -n "$command" ]; then cfcommand="$cfcommand -c '$command'" fi if [ -n "$domain" ]; then cfcommand="$cfcommand -d $domain" fi if [ -n "$instances" ]; then cfcommand="$cfcommand -i $instances" fi if [ -n "$diskLimit" ]; then cfcommand="$cfcommand -k $diskLimit" fi if [ -n "$memoryLimit" ]; then cfcommand="$cfcommand -m $memoryLimit" fi if [ -n "$hostname" ]; then cfcommand="$cfcommand -n $hostname" fi if [ -n "$timeout" ]; then cfcommand="$cfcommand -t $timeout" fi
echo "$cfcommand" eval $cfcommand
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to push App, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "####################################" echo "### Processing User Provided Service" echo "####################################"
if [ "$exposeAsService" != "FALSE" ]; then if [ -z "$upsAppName" ]; then upsAppName="$appName" fi echo "Exposing $appName as a User Provided Service" echo "User Provided Service App Name: $upsAppName" echo "User Provided Service Context Path: $upsContextPath"
echo "cf cups $upsAppName -p '{\"uri\":\"http://$upsAppName.cfapps.io$upsContextPath\"}'" cf cups $upsAppName -p '{"uri":"http://'"$upsAppName"'.cfapps.io'"$upsContextPath"'"}'
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to expose $appName as User Provided Service: $upsAppName" exit 1 fi else echo "Will NOT expose as User Provided Service" fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Processing Binding" echo "###################################"
### Handle App->Service binding if [ -n "$bind_service0" ]; then echo "cf bind-service $appName $bind_service0" cf bind-service $appName $bind_service0 fi if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to bind service, exiting" exit 1 fi if [ -n "$bind_service1" ]; then echo "cf bind-service $appName $bind_service1" cf bind-service $appName $bind_service1 fi if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to bind service, exiting" exit 1 fi if [ -n "$bind_service2" ]; then echo "cf bind-service $appName $bind_service2" cf bind-service $appName $bind_service2 fi if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to bind service, exiting" exit 1 fi if [ -n "$bind_service3" ]; then echo "cf bind-service $appName $bind_service3" cf bind-service $appName $bind_service3 fi if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to bind service, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Starting App" echo "###################################"
echo "cf start $appName" cf start $appName
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to start service $appName, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Logout" echo "###################################" echo "cf lo" cf lo

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
## Cloud Foundry expects the boolean to be lowercase trace=$traceMode trace=$(echo $trace | sed 's/.*/\L&/') export CF_TRACE=$trace
echo "###################################" echo "### Install CLI" echo "###################################" echo "wget $cliURL" wget $cliURL
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to download CLI, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm" rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to install CLI, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Login" echo "###################################"
echo "cf login -a $API -u $username -p <password> -s $space" cf login -a $API -u $username -p $password -s "$space"
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to login to Cloud Foundry, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Create Service" echo "###################################" echo "cf create-service $serviceType $servicePlan $serviceName"
isInstalled=$(cf create-service $serviceType $servicePlan $serviceName)
echo $isInstalled
if [[ $isInstalled =~ .*Service.*already\ exists.* ]]; then echo "Service Already Exists, assuming shared" sharedService=TRUE else echo "Service Created" sharedService=FALSE fi
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to create Managed Service, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Logout" echo "###################################" echo "cf lo" cf lo

#!/bin/bash
## Cloud Foundry expects the boolean to be lowercase trace=$traceMode trace=$(echo $trace | sed 's/.*/\L&/') export CF_TRACE=$trace
echo "###################################" echo "### Install CLI" echo "###################################" echo "wget $cliURL" wget $cliURL
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to download CLI, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm" rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to install CLI, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Login" echo "###################################"
echo "cf login -a $API -u $username -p <password> -s $space" cf login -a $API -u $username -p $password -s "$space"
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to login to Cloud Foundry, exiting" exit 1 fi
read -a serviceInfo <<< "$(cf services | grep $serviceName)"
# get length of an array serviceInfoLength=${#serviceInfo[@]}
# Service Information if [ serviceInfoLength > 1 ]; then echo "####################" echo "Service Information" echo "####################" echo "Name: ${serviceInfo[0]}" echo "Type: ${serviceInfo[1]}" echo "Plan: ${serviceInfo[2]}"
# Determine if there are any bindings in place b=0 # Used for tracking bindings for (( i=3; i<${serviceInfoLength}; i++ )); do if [[ $serviceInfo[$i] != "" ]]; then ## Check for comma at end, strip binding=$(echo ${serviceInfo[$i]} | sed 's/,//g') Bind[$b]=$binding echo "Binding: ${Bind[$b]}" ((b++)) fi done
# Check if Plan has changed # If so, unbind, delete, recreate, and rebind if [[ ${serviceInfo[2]} != "" && ${serviceInfo[2]} != $servicePlan ]]; then
echo echo "#############################" echo "Plan has appeared to change!" echo "#############################" echo "Current: ${serviceInfo[2]}" echo "New: $servicePlan" echo
# Unbind services for (( i=0; i<${#Bind[@]}; i++ )); do echo echo "#########################" echo "Unbinding Service ${Bind[$i]} from $serviceName" echo "#########################"
echo "cf unbind-service ${Bind[$i]} $serviceName " cf unbind-service ${Bind[$i]} $serviceName
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to unbind service, exiting" exit 1 fi done
# Delete service echo echo "#########################" echo "Deleting Service $serviceName" echo "#########################" echo "cf delete-service $serviceName -f" cf delete-service $serviceName -f
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to delete service, exiting" exit 1 fi
# Create Service echo echo "#########################" echo "Creating Service $serviceName" echo "#########################" echo "cf create-service ${serviceInfo[1]} $servicePlan $serviceName" #cf create-service ${serviceInfo[1]} $servicePlan $serviceName ## TODO - Enable Plan Change cf create-service ${serviceInfo[1]} ${serviceInfo[2]} $serviceName
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to create service, exiting" exit 1 fi
# Rebind Services for (( i=0; i<${#Bind[@]}; i++ )); do echo echo "#########################" echo "Rebinding Service ${Bind[$i]} to $serviceName" echo "#########################"
echo "cf bind-service ${Bind[$i]} $serviceName" cf bind-service ${Bind[$i]} $serviceName
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to bind service, exiting" exit 1 fi done
# Restart Apps for (( i=0; i<${#Bind[@]}; i++ )); do echo echo "#########################" echo "Restarting Bound Apps" echo "#########################"
echo "cf restart ${Bind[$i]}" cf restart ${Bind[$i]} done
fi fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Logout" echo "###################################" echo "cf lo" cf lo

#!/bin/bash
## Cloud Foundry expects the boolean to be lowercase trace=$traceMode trace=$(echo $trace | sed 's/.*/\L&/') export CF_TRACE=$trace
echo "###################################" echo "### Install CLI" echo "###################################"
echo "wget $cliURL" wget $cliURL
echo "rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm" rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm
echo "###################################" echo "### Login" echo "###################################"
echo "cf login -a $API -u $username -p <password> -s $space" cf login -a $API -u $username -p $password -s "$space"
echo "###################################" echo "### Remove Managed Service" echo "###################################"
echo "Shared Service: $sharedService" echo "deleteOnTeardown: $deleteOnTeardown" if [[ $sharedService == "FALSE" || $deleteOnTeardown == "TRUE" ]]; then echo "cf delete-service $serviceName -f" cf delete-service $serviceName -f else echo "Service is shared, RETAINING" fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Logout" echo "###################################" echo "cf lo" cf lo

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
## Cloud Foundry expects the boolean to be lowercase trace=$traceMode trace=$(echo $trace | sed 's/.*/\L&/') export CF_TRACE=$trace
echo "###################################" echo "### Install CLI" echo "###################################"
echo "wget $cliURL" wget $cliURL
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to download CLI, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm" rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to install CLI, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Login" echo "###################################"
echo "cf login -a $API -u $username -p <password> -s $space" cf login -a $API -u $username -p $password -s "$space"
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to login to Cloud Foundry, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Create User Provided Service" echo "###################################"
echo "cf cups $serviceName -p $userDefinedServiceParameters" isInstalled=$(cf cups $serviceName -p $userDefinedServiceParameters)
if [[ $isInstalled =~ .*Service.*already\ exists.* ]]; then echo "Service Already Exists, assuming shared" sharedService=TRUE else echo "Service Created" sharedService=FALSE fi
if [ $? -gt 0 ]; then echo "Failed to create User-Defined Service, exiting" exit 1 fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Logout" echo "###################################"
echo "cf lo" cf lo

#!/bin/bash
## Cloud Foundry expects the boolean to be lowercase trace=$traceMode trace=$(echo $trace | sed 's/.*/\L&/') export CF_TRACE=$trace
echo "###################################" echo "### Install CLI" echo "###################################"
echo "wget https://s3.amazonaws.com/go-cli/releases/v6.1.1/cf-cli_amd64.rpm" wget https://s3.amazonaws.com/go-cli/releases/v6.1.1/cf-cli_amd64.rpm
echo "rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm" rpm -i cf-cli_amd64.rpm
echo "###################################" echo "### Login" echo "###################################"
echo "cf login -a $API -u $username -p <password> -s $space" cf login -a $API -u $username -p $password -s "$space"
echo "###################################" echo "### Remove Managed Service" echo "###################################"
echo "Shared Service: $sharedService" echo "deleteOnTeardown: $deleteOnTeardown" if [[ $sharedService="FALSE" || $deleteOnTeardown="TRUE" ]]; then echo "cf delete-service $serviceName -f" cf delete-service $serviceName -f else echo "Service is shared, RETAINING" fi
echo "###################################" echo "### Logout" echo "###################################" echo "cf lo" cf lo
